comments.comment: I heard this song for the first time after 3 years and it brought tears to my eyes. When life was like this everything was perfect and everyday was a day to live happily. I can't ever have those days back where everything was carefree. I have to highlight the part at 3:22 as it reminded me how ungrateful i was for not enjoying life as much as i could have. Now i have to get through highschool and think about uni , and its just devastating.
